member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_RESOLUTION_RATIOS_COUNT
member.summary: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves the number of supported resolution ratios for the specified codec.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_RESOLUTION_RATIOS_COUNT.NodeIndex
member.summary: In multi-adapter operation, this indicates which physical adapter of the device this operation applies to.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_RESOLUTION_RATIOS_COUNT.Codec
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the codec for which the number of supported resolution ratios is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_RESOLUTION_RATIOS_COUNT.ResolutionRatiosCount
member.summary: Receives a UINT indicating the number of supported resolution ratios for the specified codec.
